def_cn: 极痛苦的;折磨人的;剧痛的
def_en: If you describe something as excruciating, you are emphasizing that it is extremely painful, either physically or emotionally.

def_cn: 难以忍受的;令人苦恼的
def_en: If you describe something as excruciating, you mean that it is very unpleasant to experience, for example because it is very boring or embarrassing.
